resources.string: Use IMDb\'s built in \"Share this link\" functionality to add movies to CouchPotato

Mobile Potato is a companion for CouchPotato with which you can add movies to CouchPotato's queue.

You will need a working CouchPotato setup and the IMDb app to be able to use this app.

Please visit https://github.com/RuudBurger/CouchPotato#readme for more information on CouchPotato.

Any feedback or suggestions?
E-mail: mobilepotato@oskarsson.nl

Note: This app uses Google Analytics to anonymously track usage
